name: The Enchanted Vineyard
description:
DESCRIPTION
An exceptional venue for your wedding, this extensive vineyard estate oozes Provençale charm and elegance while maintaining rustic authenticity and character. Lovingly brought to life by the current owners, the estate offers countless options for your celebration with vineyards, manoirs, the chapel and woodland as well as its own hamlet; there is plenty to discover here. The estate also features outstanding accommodation for you and your guests.
The shaded village square is ideal for starting the ceremony with a wine of honor. It has a pleasant area of 250 m² that can accommodate up to 150 people for banquets and 300 people for cocktails.
The panoramic cellar is the perfect place for your reception, it will fit perfectly into the romantic atmosphere of your wedding with its Florentine architecture and its breathtaking view of the lush nature. With a surface area of 200 m², you can accommodate up to 120 people for banquets and 250 people for cocktails.
The Chapel
Built on the ruins of an ancient hamlet dating from the 17th century, inspired by the Val chapel, it was consecrated by the Archbishop of Toulon and Fréjus. Minimalist, it was decorated by the artist Gérard Traquandi. In front of it is a pretty square with a fountain, this intimate and romantic place is perfect for a reception or a blessing.
Arcades
The arcades overlook and dominate the area at the top of a cascade of old terraces. They come from the pediment of a commercial court, but fit into the landscape as if they had always been there.
The Mill
This mill is a copy of the Moulin, the latter was designed in the 17th century. As the owners fell in love with this superb architecture, they decided to reproduce it on the estate. The mill works with an east wind or mistral rotation system, its mechanics are from the past but competent to make flour in the old fashioned way.
The Vault
The cellar welcomes you at the entrance to the estate, leaving you with a breathtaking view of lush nature. With its Florentine architecture, it fits perfectly into the romantic landscape of green Provence. In winter, you will be seduced by its warm and spacious interior, while in summer, you will enjoy tasting a glass of wine in its village square where calm, authenticity and charm reign.
Accommodation
We welcome you in the heart of green Provence and offer you our two delightful locations for accommodation. Nestled in the unspoiled nature of the vineyard, these havens of peace will allow you to escape.
The hamlet
This somewhat isolated haven of peace will allow you to dive into the heart of the life of the estate and its unspoiled nature. It offers you prestigious services such as 7 bedrooms (including 2 annexes) each with a bathroom, a private swimming pool, a warm living room, and an unobstructed view of the plain for you and your guests to enjoy. An ideal place to relax with your loved ones.
The bastide has the charm of authentic little Provence houses. Furnished in a flea market, it evokes the sweetness of life of yesteryear. It nevertheless has all modern comforts and a charming infinity pool with its adjoining summer kitchen. A large terrace sheltered by large trees allows you to enjoy long summer lunches. An ideal place to get out of the hectic life and feel out of time.
Take advantage of the exclusivity of the estate to take your couple photos in exceptional settings: the Arcades, the Windmill, the waterfall, the vineyards and many other idyllic places.
Organize an intimate ceremony in the small chapel to create an unforgettable moment. For a more bucolic atmosphere, go to the chapel in a horse-drawn carriage.
As you will have understood, many options are possible to achieve the wedding of your dreams and make this day unique. Please do get in touch for more information.
